title: [vs17.7] adjust XmlReader.Create to passed path with potentially invalid character
body:
Fixes #9028 for vs17.7

Work item (Internal use):
- related to #9062

Summary
- we have proactively fixed some potential filename-with-unicode-chars issue and now it was reported as GT18030 bug in #9062
- backport #9028 to vs17.7

Customer Impact
- compliance with GT18030

Regression?
- no

Testing
- Local
- PR Gates
- OneClick team confirmed that it has been fixed in Main
- Dogfooding: it has been in main for about week without any related bug report

Risk
- very small

Backport of #9028 to vs17.7

/cc @rainersigwald @YuliiaKovalova
